solution_line_template: The total weight for the {num_men} men is {num_men} men * {avg_weight_men} pounds per man = <<{num_men}*{avg_weight_men}={total_weight_men}>>{total_weight_men} pounds
The total weight for the {num_women} women is {num_women} women * {avg_weight_women} pounds per woman = <<{num_women}*{avg_weight_women}={total_weight_women}>>{total_weight_women} pounds

The total weight for {total_people} men and women is {total_weight_men} pounds + {total_weight_women} pounds = <<{total_weight_men}+{total_weight_women}={total_combined_weight}>>{total_combined_weight} pounds
The average weight per person is {total_combined_weight} pounds / {total_people} men and women = <<{total_combined_weight}/{total_people}={average_weight}>>{average_weight} pounds
